articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Using R to analyze/illustrate data and backup some of the FRM questions
articles.contents:
Hello! Iâ€™m David Harper, CFA, FRM. I started bionicturtle.com in 2004 and built it into the #1 exam preparation provider (EPP) for the Financial Risk Manager (FRM). In February of 2021, I sold the business to CeriFi and continue to run it as President, Bionic Turtle, a CeriFi company.
This is a distill blog that holds my code snippets.
